faqList.question: What cosmetic procedures are covered by insurance?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Generally, cosmetic procedures that are purely aesthetic are not covered by insurance. However, certain treatments can have medical justifications that might qualify them for insurance coverage. We recommend consulting with your insurance provider to understand which treatments can be covered based on your specific policy. For cosmetic procedures that are not covered, our medspa in NYC offers financing options to help manage the costs.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A non-refundable deposit is required for all appointments at the time of scheduling. This deposit is applied to the cost of your treatment. If you need to reschedule, the deposit will cover your treatment cost for one change, as long as it's done in line with our cancellation policy. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"However, if you cancel late, don't show up, or reschedule more than once, you will lose your deposit. As a small business, frequent reschedulings and late cancellations greatly affect our ability to provide the best service to all our clients.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqList.question: Should I eat before my appointment?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We recommend that all patients eat at least a light snack before any procedure. This helps maintain your comfort and ensures you remain steady during the treatment, especially since some cosmetic procedures might cause light-headedness.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqList.question: What should I expect when I arrive for my appointment?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are located at 18 E 41 Street on the 14th floor. When you arrive, proceed to the 14th floor and sign in on the iPad for \"Lushful Aesthetics\", or with the receptionist if one is present. Make yourself comfortable in the waiting area and a member of our team will greet you at the time of your appointment. Arriving over 10 minutes late for your appointment may result in a rescheduling and late cancellation fee.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqList.question: Can someone else pay for me?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lushful Aesthetics does not accept deposits or payments from third parties on behalf of a patient except in the form of cash or a Lushful Aesthetics gift card. Please note that the name on the card used for payments must match the name on your appointment or you must provide proof of ownership of this card at the time of checkout. Deposits made using a card with a different name will be automatically refunded and the appointment will be canceled. Patients must provide proof of identity at the time of checkout.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We implement this policy to prevent fraudulent transactions and ensure that the cardholder authorizes the payment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
